ratings.comment: I connected with her teaching style and found her helpful during office hours.  Didn't ace the course, but did well enough.  I will take another course from her.

Very boring and unclear with respect to expectations.  Also unable to prompt discussion when students run out of novel things to talk about, which shouldn't be the case when she is supposed to be the expert on the subject.

She is terrible.  Tests were extremely tricky, and she says "This is the idea of...." before everything she says.  I had a hard time following her lectures, and she was not helpful in office hours.  Seems like a nice person though, just a terrible professor.

She was hard to follow during lecture. Her powerpoints go up about 20 minutes before class but it is hard to write notes without them as she talks so quickly and often jumps around her slides. Her tests are very hard even after studying alot the questions are poorly chooses bases on her lectures. The book is not used at all.

Very nice lady, but has no public speaking ability. She sounded like she was about to cry whenever she speaks, and has poor time management skills when it comes to lecture.  Her exams are very wordy and uses many double negatives. Her lectures are very boring. Reads off the slide. I wouldn't recommend this class.

She has a really difficult time conveying what she wants from her students. The exams are EXTREMELY wordy. I wouldn't say the class is really difficult. That being said, I didn't enjoy the class at all. Her lectures are boring. Don't buy the book.

Very nice person who wants to help but her lectures prove to be very confusing and fail to teach you information on the exams. Overall a decent class but you do need to put effort into it. Attendance is also mandatory but the textbook is most definitely not.

Great teacher. If you got into UW Madison then this class should be a piece of cake. Her tests are kind of a joke and I did very well in her class without having to review because I learned the material as we went.

Her exams were terrible.  Did really well on the first one, bombed the second one after studying the same amount for each.  She is inconsistent with her teaching and her exam problems have three correct answers that were both correct.  Asked her for clarification on one of her problems and she couldn't even explain her own question.  Bad.
